Netscape Communicator 4 7 For Mac Unix

28 Sep 1999

Netscape Communicator 4.7 has appeared for \ndownload on the Netscape FTP site, but currently only for Macintosh and UNIX variants. \nAs yet I've been unable to find any information about bug-fixes, additional features, \netc, so if you find some extra info, please post it as a comment.

You can grab the Mac version here and the UNIX \nversion here.
